Text:
To add Comic Cover Thumbnails to your torrents:

Google the issue to find the Cover image, copy and go to:

http://bayimg.com/


Make sure to Mark:

Settings
[X] Resize to:
300x300 TPB - Torrent Image

It will give you an address with a 9-digit code at the end, JUST copy the 9-digit code and put that into the torrent image field. Make sure there isnt a space before as TPB loses its mind about that.


Thanks for all the Ups
Thanks for the tip MrDowntown...will follow the same in the future releases..
If Mr.Downtown is helping you out your going to be a success around here mdusanjay.  Your doing a good job so far.  Thank you for the hard work.
